channel.title: streaming on The Unhandled Exception Podcast
channel.description: Recent content in streaming on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 20: Mark Rendle's Stream of Consciousness
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by Mark Rendle to chat about his experiences live-coding/streaming on Twitch! Warning: We went on a lot of tangents during the conversation! It’s all good though - as they were all awesome tangents! We not only talked about streaming, but also Blazor, C#, Unity, the rate of tech advancement, teaching kids to code, and much more! Mark’s Bio Mark Rendle decided he wanted to be a programmer when he was 10, became a professional programmer when he was 16, and is still a programmer 30 years later.
